Tips and Links

We Help Each Other!

One of our core values as a club is that we collaborate together and therefore we help each other out. This is the section where teams can submit their tips that they think could be beneficial to other teams and even other robotics clubs! To submit more tips, simply email: exothermictips@gmail.com.
